Name: Red Embrace: Hollywood
About the game: Story Summary: Los Angeles, California, 1996 . A young newcomer is turned into a vampire and thrust into the dark underworld of society, forced to sink or swim. You are that newcomer. Overview: Red Embrace: Hollywood is a unique vampire visual novel that puts you, the player, at the heart of the story. Choose your appearance, pick your vampire House, and make hundreds of choices that determine not only your future--but the future of Los Angeles. In the world of RE:H, you can be anything... because you're already dead. † Genre: Drama, dark comedy, psychological † Rating: R-17 † Routes: 3 † Endings: 15 † Length: 230,000 words (15+ hours playtime) † EVERY DIALOGUE RESPONSE IS A CHOICE † Customizable MC (name, gender pronouns, skin color, hairstyle, hair color, eye color, accessories, piercings/earrings, bust, jaw) † Your custom MC is shown in CGs † Choose your own vampire House † Three (male) mentors to choose from, with optional romance routes † Have your very own (optional) human blood pet/slave, male or female † NPCs remember how you treat them † † † † † † † † † † † † † † † YOU CAN BE ANYTHING BECAUSE YOU'RE ALREADY DEAD Dovah of Argent Games : Frontman, singer Gamma of Argent Games : Bass Sh00lace : Guitar DAM NA : Drums Murcielo : Keyboard Honorary Members: No Deadly Studios : Drums ESSER : Guitar
